entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 22 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 22 except 13 near Lake Erie. Humidex 27. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
